CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 17-19 Recently , polymer solar cells based on blends of copolymers of thiophene imide and benzodithiophene 20-23 or cyclopentadithiophene 24 with soluble fullerene derivatives PC71BM or PC61BM exhibited PCEs of 3-6.8 % .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| copolymers of thiophene imide and benzodithiophene |
| copolymers of thiophene imide and cyclopentadithiophene |
| PC71BM |
| PC61BM |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| copolymers of thiophene imide and benzodithiophene |
| copolymers of thiophene imide and cyclopentadithiophene |
| PC71BM |
| PC61BM |

These entities are clearly material names as they refer to specific types of polymers and fullerene derivatives mentioned in the paragraph.
